onboarding_content: Want to feel your best every day? Stay healthy by drinking enough water! We’re here to help you track your water and keep you motivated to stay hydrated. You’ve got this!
earn_more_title: Tap the bubbles to get more Drinks points
invite_friend_text: {{name}} invites you to 7EN DRINKS! Get +7 Drinks for joining by link:
notify_friend_text: {{name}} reminds you to drink a glass of water. You can check in here:
invite_info: For every friend you invite you get {{value}} Drinks Points
drink_water_success: Congratulation! You are full of energy now!
drink_daily_limit: You have reached your daily drink limit.
drink_hour_limit: You can drink again after 2 hours.
faq_1_content: Drinks points are the in-game currency you earn for regular water consumption and other tasks. The more you drink, the more points you accumulate, and the closer you get to bonuses!
faq_2_content: Waterdrop is your chance to get special bonuses for playing the game. Keep an eye out for updates so you don't miss out on bonuses and rewards!

quests.title: Quests
quests.description: Complete quests and increase your balance. Use balance to participate in events and practices.

quest_error_not_join_channel: You are not subscribed to the channel
quest_error_time_not_elapsed: You need to wait at least 1 minute before completing this task again
welcome_message:
*7EN DRINKS will fight your thirst!*
The bot reminds you to drink water on time, monitors your progress, and energizes you!
referral_message:
*About the 7EN DRINKS referral system:*

1. Register through @se7en_drinks_bot and receive 500 tokens.
2. Share your unique registration link with friends and earn 200 tokens.
notification_24h: Don't forget to drink water and about Drinks points. Stop by and pump your water balance!
notification_48h: Drinking water? Go to 7EN DRINKS and get points for it!
notification_7d: Feeling thirsty? Your body definitely needs water. Come back to 7EN DRINKS and refill your Drinks supply!
comboFailDescription: You can try again next day!
